text: Cheryl Ladd (born Cheryl Jean Stoppelmoor, July 12, 1951 in Huron, South Dakota) is an American actress. Ladd is known for many television series and many movies. She is best known for her role as Kris Munroe in Charlie's Angels. She was with the show until 1981. == References == Category:American movie actors Category:Writers from South Dakota Category:American television actors Category:Actors from South Dakota Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Cheryl Ladd
